title: Combat AI framework [Team based, combat focused, replicated]
description: Optimized, team based, combat focused AI framework.
longDescription:
Note: if you are having issues with the asset, join the discord for help, before leaving a negative review. The code was tested by me and EPIC games before publishing.

What is the Combat AI framework?

Combat AI framework is a modern AI system that allows developers to expand and improve AI's decision-making. Using a decision-scoring system, you can build any AI you ever wanted. CAIF features include a replicated team system, team-based perception, perception processing (AI memory), and a score-based decision-making system.


This version includes the Example system:

  • AI vs AI combat
  • Taking cover
  • Going towards gunshots
  • Locomotion system (ADS/ low ready gun)
  • Weapon system

Warning: The example system will not work out of the box. Consult the documentation on how to fix AI


Check out our demo

You can play this game that works on the Combat AI framework.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Replicated and integrated AI team system
  •  Perception processing (sight, hearing, damage)
  • Ai target memory (Time in sight, time since heard, is in sight)
  • Score based decision-making

Number of Blueprints: 12 (example system not included)

Network Replicated: (Yes)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows

Documentation: Quick start guide
